resources.string: NWMap+ is an app that gives you the user the ability to look up information on popular neighbourhoods in New Westminster
This app was created by: Elisa Chu, Rost Myshkin and Davin Deol
It consists of 3 pages: Main, Neighbourhoods and Details (where we are going to be)
This page lists all the different neighbourhoods
We get the list from the database which is populated using the New Westminster data sets (Made by Elisa Chu)
This page\'s main content is a list with a custom style for each item (Made by Davin Deol)
When tapped, the next activity will open with a custom animation! (Made by Davin Deol)
This page displays a map of the neighbourhood, a brief description and a bunch of toggles
First we load the map. Fun fact, just this part takes up almost 40% of the app\s total code (Made by Elisa)
These determines whether or not you want info about just the neighbourhood or w/ the surrounding area (Made by Elisa)
The description is much simpler. Just some text with the ability to scroll so that nothing gets pushed out of what we see
This activity\s list uses checkboxes and directly affects what the map displays
Notice how the item corresponding to what you selected has now vanished from the map. To bring it back, just tap the item again
And if you\'re interested, you can actually share your interest in the city to Twitter
And that concludes our tour. We hope this tour has helped give you a little behind-the-scenes view of our app and maybe other apps. Have a good one!
